fulltext:
Nhu Nguyen (Nguyen Bao Quynh Nhu)
Regional Product Manager
4 years experienced in leading Customer Impact, Finance and Logistics products. A young mind that
constantly seeks challenges and self-improvement opportunities. A dedicated and responsible individual.
Also a nature admirer, wanderlust, and coffee addict.
nhu.nguyen.angela@gmail.com
+84 907 010 875
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
12 July, 1989
SKILLS
Experienced with Agile methodologies
Experienced with Jira and Confluence
Experienced with software development process
Proficient with MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
Fluent in English and Vietnamese
Good team player
High sense of responsibility, pro-activeness and devotion
Strong business acumen and problem-solving skills
Able to work efficiently under high pressure and without supervision
WORK EXPERIENCE
Regional Operations Product Manager
Lazada eLogistics
12/2016 – Present
Achievements/Tasks
Function as lead Product Manager for Finance vertical for 6 months (currently), lead Product Manager for Customer Experience
vertical for 2 years, and simultaneously supporting Product Manager for Logistics vertical for 10 months, working with Scrum Agile
Methodology.
Designed and implemented end-to-end solution for Lazada reverse logistics, from customer return (Logistics), warehouse quality
check (Fulfillment), to subsequent delivery back to customer or merchant (Logistics). This functionality also includes smart routing
capabilities to define best fitting logistics solution. This helps fasten Lazada return process, improve customer experience by
providing tracking on their returns, solving business needs with a fully automated software that reduces costs for logistic operations.
Maintain and continuously improve Notification Management System to cater for Lazada eLogistics clients, offering both customer
and seller communications throughout the parcel journey. This reduces 20% of seller contacts to Partner Support Center for parcel
confirmation, and improves lead time of agents solving tickets by 40%.
Successfully led the integration of Notification Management System and new Lazada eLogistics service with Lazada new platforms
(with respect to Alibaba-Lazada acquisition). The new Lazada eLogistics service ensures a continuous stream of updates from
multiple internal systems (Transportation, Returns, Fulfillment, etc.) to be successfully conveyed to the platform via APIs, providing
transparency to eCommerce platforms and their upstream systems.
Regional Operations Product Manager
Lazada Group
10/2015 – 12/2016
Achievements/Tasks
Functioned as lead Product Manager for Customer Experience and Finance verticals.
Successfully led the integration of Lazada with SAP for Warehouse Inventory Management, Purchase Order and Sales order
management; managed both internal and outsourcing development teams (Accenture) to interface SAP and Lazada internal
Operational systems, in order to support Finance department with their needs.
Revamped Refunds processing to automate SAP accounting records, and Finance Reconciliation to ease the cash (Cash On Delivery)
handling process. This improves refund lead time by automating refund amount calculation, security by applying a flexible approval
workflow, and assuring accuracy of Financial reporting in SAP.
Designed and implemented Notification Management System which provides end-to-end solution for Lazada customer
communications. This system interacts with multiple sources of data and uses multiple channels (emails, SMS, etc.) to provide trace-
ability and transparency for customers on their shopping experience in Lazada, reducing nearly 30% of calls to Customer Service
hotline.
Page 1 of 2
WORK EXPERIENCE
Regional Senior Associate Customer Experience
Lazada Group
12/2013 – 10/2015
Achievements/Tasks
Functioned as project manager for Customer Experience vertical.
Deep-dived in weekly NPS and complaint reports to understand customer needs and pain points, performing market research and
bench marking, proposing initiatives and leading projects to improve Customer Experience in 6 Lazada ventures, especially in
Customer communications and self-service on the website (Help Center, Chat box), by collaborating with local business teams and
regional tech teams.
Successfully launched new Return policy and new Shipping fee policy across 6 ventures to improve not only customer experience
during checkout and post delivery, but also seller experience with clear contract on payment and penalty alignment between Lazada
and its sellers.
Marketing and Sales Executive
Sunbytes Ltd. Co.
08/2012 – 12/2013
Achievements/Tasks
Functioned as Marketing and Sales Executive, reported directly to Managing Director.
Planned and ran Marketing and Sales campaigns to generate sales leads through social media and cold calls, and build brand
awareness through networking events and email newsletters.
Drafted and provided price proposals to the clients.
EDUCATION
Master of Business Administration
Australian Institute of Business (AIB)
2012 – 2015
Bachelor of Arts
Vietnam National University of Social Sciences and Humanities
2007 – 2011
CERTIFICATES
TOEIC Certificate (2012)
score of 935 / 990
LANGUAGES
Vietnamese English
VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE
Court Interpreter
The Court House of Ho Chi Minh City
2011 – 2013
Exhibit Interpreter
Student Organization
2007 – 2011
INTERESTS
Traveling Reading Swimming BEER! COFFEE!
Page 2 of 2

educations.major: Quản lý đô thị và công trình

educations.school: Vietnam National University of Social Sciences and Humanities

Achievements/Tasks Function as lead Product Manager for Finance vertical for 6 months (currently), lead Product Manager for Customer Experience vertical for 2 years, and simultaneously supporting Product Manager for Logistics vertical for 10 months, working with Scrum Agile Methodology. Designed and implemented end-to-end solution for Lazada reverse logistics, from customer return (Logistics), warehouse quality check (Fulfillment), to subsequent delivery back to customer or merchant (Logistics).
